category: Gyeonggi player registration regulations/Article 17 (Registration and place of registration)
contents: Article 17 (Registration and place of registration) ① Anyone who wishes to become an athlete must register with a member sports organization every year as a member of an athletics department, sports club, sports club, etc. ② The same player may not register in more than one division within the same member sport organization as defined in Article 18, Paragraph 1. ③ The same athlete may register with multiple member sports organizations within the same special city, metropolitan city, special autonomous city, province, or province (hereinafter referred to as *city/province). ④ The player’s place of registration shall be the city/province where the player’s affiliated organization is located. ⑤ If the university's main school and branch campus are located in different cities or provinces, the registration location of the university athletics department shall be registered in accordance with the following items. 1. Individual sports must be registered by the city/province where the university is located. 2. For team events and individual team events, the main school and branch schools can be registered as separate teams, or the main school and branch schools can be integrated and registered as one city/province. However, in case of integrated registration, the place of registration shall be the city/province designated by the school. Member sport organizations may restrict changes to registration locations depending on the characteristics of the sport. ⑥ Athletics departments of Korea Open University and distance colleges may register at the registration address designated by the relevant school, and the designated registration location cannot be changed within 4 years from the date of registration or change.
